column5: Nice Hat!
some great fish glen, beautiful striper!
Imagine if GCD and Johnny Bass went fishing together?  The women would overtake the forums!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  :)

WOW, excellent job there Glen! UL eh? That stripe is magnificent! Were there any female bass pros near shore this time? I don't like the sound of turbines near a dam. You did good Bubba. Really glad you had a good time and I  thank you for sharing that. You got some super fish (again) today.

Great report and pics Glenn  Nice couple of hours spent on the water bubba Some good looking striped bass.... The big one must of given you a hell of a fight on the UL rod  Great job coach and thanks for sharing Leechman
Hey what - I say what's goin on there! the trees are green and yer fishin half nekkid!

Excellent report there bubba and I love the shot of that beautiful striper  This is one of your best reports man you caught alot of fish.  You know one day I am going to make it out your way so I can fish that dam with you.  Thanks for the excellent report
Well done! Thats impressive for an ultralite!
Well done Bubba !!
Thats agreat day of fishin bubba !!!!!.  ..a very nice striper man.  ...cheers   p.s. thanks for the well wishes buddy,ill be back to fishin in no time flat !!!!

Man alive Glen, that is a smorgasbord of fish!  At first I thought, man, nice spot, then another, then the striper.....you just couldn't stop could you.  Good on you, days like that are hard to come by.  Good stuff.
Geeze Glen.......they musta been in there thick today!!!  Great report!  Sinker
Ya did good Dawg...congrats !!!  Guess you got home in time to trim de turf eh ???
Those are some great looking fish. Great report. Love to read about others who take to the thrill of fishing ultralites.
Awesome Striper Glen, heckuva fish.  That damn opening early has me a little unnerved.  Be careful out there bubba!!  Great report.  Joey
Whoah!  Lookit that.. whoppa!!  Well done my... bubba!  Arn't you glad you let your grass grow a little longa?  yyeeeaahh!  HD
Nice Fish GCD, A couple of those Darker spotted bass almost look like Mean Mouths and that striped bass must have been a nice fight on four pound test line, Nice pics and report.
Beauty Striper, lots a action 4 sure...
Totally jealous of the striper!  Great stuff! And I have to admit, after fishing in a sweater and hunting coat this morning, I'm also jealous of the weather.
Was wondering when we'd see a report with you and fish again!!  That UL setup sure was the ticket for you!!  Some great fish Glen.
great report!  nice fish you got into there!  man im jealous of the weather you have down there right now!  cheers!
Nice report GCD, looked like a fun time out on the water.
'Not too bad for a UL rod with 4lb. test in strong current eh!' Spoken like a true Canadian! Nice pics dude. Looks like a great afternoon o' bassin'!
